about_the_game:
Girl Survivor is a survival, construction, and role-playing game with a zombie themed background.
background
The story takes place in the future, where the world is occupied by zombies, and countless people are infected by zombies and become zombies
And you may be the last human girl in the world
Living in an abandoned building
But you haven't given up hope. You are still in this world, and there are still many survivors like you fighting hard to survive
playing method
When you are alone in a zombie world
Your only task is to survive
Collect materials
Although zombies are cruel, they lack wisdom.
You must be in a building full of zombies, and you must learn to deal with them in order to find opportunities to collect materials for daily life
build
Use all available resources to build your own shelter to resist zombie attacks
plant
The ready-made food is becoming increasingly scarce, and you must plant your own plants
When you collect plant seeds, you can plant them and harvest more!
Survivors
Kind and forever you, always believe that there are more people in this world waiting for you to save

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes the nudity of the character's body, as well as exposed clothing, breast shakes, hip shakes and other body physical effects.

name: Girl Survivors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win11
  • Processor: i5-12490f
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
